summary:
Educated as a social researcher I'm using a Human-Centred approach to understand how people behave and work together. I conduct every project with curiosity, empathy and enthusiasm and I'm most happy when I research and design solutions that create social impact.
Co-created and facilitated learning programs for marginalized groups, I fierily believe in the power of social design as a process to empower people.
I speak Bulgarian, English and basic Dutch. I am analytical, social and able to work with procedures and regulations.

- Design Impact assessment's innovation tools

I'm assisting in the matchmaking process of creatives with a refugee background.
Key responsibilities: 
 - Co-design and co-facilitate workshops within “Creative Lab” and “Creative Lab 3 days sprint”  programs using design thinking tools
 - Impact measurement and research evaluation of the social inclusion program "Creative Lab” which gives creative newcomers a kick-start into their professional career
 - Mapping the Netherlands creative industry and assisting in building a structural partnership network', 'title': 'Social designer & Matchmaker assistant', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': 28172873, 'name': 'Digital Society School', 'logo': 'https://media.licdn.com/dms/image/C4D0BAQE6C39T2RzExA/company-logo_400_400/0/1630584760576?e=1700697600&v=beta&t=7bceBYlnDrQKiqD0LFizaIwj54Q8txnPFVl1ytSX8Qc', 'url': 'https://www.linkedin.com/school/digitalsocietyschoolamsterdam/', 'employees': {'start': 11, 'end': 50}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Amsterdam Area, Netherlands', 'date': {'start': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}, 'end': {'month': 6, 'day': None, 'year': 2019}}, 'company': 'Digital Society School', 'description': 'Part of a multidisciplinary team composed of both academic and applied study area, following a high - paced, agile Human-centered Design process on a project for Johan Cruyff Arena, Amsterdam. - Conduct applied research by using a design methodology to develop innovative solutions with an impact on the digital society. 
 - Explore, imagine, prototype and testing ideas to create a better after-event experience for the visitors of stadium Arena, Amsterdam.', 'title': 'User Researcher', 'employment_type': 'Full-time'}]}, {'company': {'id': None, 'name': 'ATA48 ltd - Web development, mobile apps, social research and online campaigns', 'logo': None, 'url': None, 'employees': {'start': None, 'end': None}}, 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'profile_positions': [{'location': 'Sofia, Bulgaria', 'date': {'start': {'month': 1, 'day': None, 'year': 2008}, 'end': {'month': 9, 'day': None, 'year': 2018}}, 'company': 'ATA48 ltd - Web development, mobile apps, social research and online campaigns', 'description': 'ATA48 ltd is an outsourcing company, specialising in developing mobile apps and websites, mainly for Dutch clients.
